heading: Enhance your body's natural detoxification and immune function with lymphatic drainage
intro:
Full Decongestive Lymphatic Therapy (DLT) an intensive treatment for Lymphoedema with multicomponent bandaging can also be provided.

Your expert care will be provided within a safe, private relaxing environment that promotes well-being.
list: Boosts immune system and eliminates toxins
Reduces swelling and inflammation which optimises wound healing
Improves scar healing and reduces fibrosis
Optimises cancer care after treatments such as radiotherapy/chemotherapy
